section.p: The JavaDoc for SignServer is available at SIGNSERVER_HOME/tmp/doc/index.html after running "ant javadoc".

section.name: Java Client API

section.name: SigningAndValidation API
section.p: The SigningAndValidation API is a wrapper around the previous mentioned API in order to have a simplified interface that also is the same regardless if WebService or EJB Remote calls are used.
To use the API include the file signingandvalidationapi.jar as well as all JAR-files in the lib-folder available in SIGNSERVER_HOME/dist-client/signingandvalidationapi/.
